Name: Osiris statuette
Description: Statuette representing Osiris, in the form of a mummy, with his arms down at his sides and holding the crook and flail. He has a false beard and on his head is the atef-crown. On his back and next to the feet (at the right side) are two small loops for suspension. Underneath the feet is an appendage which tells us that the piece used to be inserted into something.
